data.name: MessageBox_Caution
data.value: Caution

data.name: MessageBox_Confirm_Delete
data.value: Do you really want to delete this item?

data.name: MessageBox_Fail_Load_User
data.value: Failed to load environment variables from current user. Unfortunately, I do not know why this happends.

data.name: MessageBox_Error
data.value: Error

data.name: MessageBox_Apply_User
data.value: You are about to apply all the environment variables to the current user profile.This action cannot be undone. Any incorrect variables may cause problems to your system. Do you want to continue?

data.name: MessageBox_Apply_System
data.value: You are about to apply all the environment variables to the system.This action cannot be undone. Any incorrect variables may cause problems to your system. Do you want to continue?

data.name: MessageBox_Already_New
data.value: You have already add a new value. You cannot add more before you name it.

data.name: MessageBox_Failed_Apply
data.value: Failed to apply changes to your system.

data.name: MessageBox_Failed_Export
data.value: Failed to export environment variables to file!

data.name: MessageBox_Failed_Load_File
data.value: Failed to load environment variables from file.

data.name: MessageBox_Failed_Load_System
data.value: Failed to load environment variables from system. Unfortunately, I do not know why this happends.

data.name: MessageBox_Nothing_Save
data.value: Nothing to be saved.

data.name: MessageBox_Not_Loaded
data.value: You have not loaded environment variables yet.

data.name: MessageBox_Not_User
data.value: The variables currently loaded is not for user. Do you want to apply them to the user?

data.name: MessageBox_Unsaved_Exit
data.value: You have unsaved environment variables. Do you want to exit the program?

data.name: MessageBox_Unsaved_New
data.value: You have unsaved environment variables. Do you want to load new variables from file?

data.name: MessageBox_Unsaved_System
data.value: You have unsaved environment variables. Do you want to load the system environment variables?

data.name: MessageBox_Unsaved_User
data.value: You have unsaved environment variables. Do you want to load the user environment variables?

data.name: MessageBox_Warning
data.value: Warning

data.name: StatusLabel_Apply_User_Successful
data.value: Environment variables are successfully applied to the current user.

data.name: StatusLabel_Appying_User
data.value: Applying environment variables to current user.

data.name: StatusLabel_Is_Valid
data.value: All the values are valid directories.

data.name: StatusLabel_Not_Valid
data.value: The highlighted values are not valid directories.
